entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 10.
